DOC.brief_summary: Vitamin D deficiency is common after bariatric surgery. This study is designed to determine if a high dose monthly supplement of vitamin D 3 will be effective in helping improve vitamin D status after surgery such as gastric bypass. Bariatric surgery subjects taking monthly high dose cholecalciferol supplements in addition to the standard vitamin D protocol will have a significant rise in serum vitamin D levels compared to the subjects taking only the usual vitamin D protocol.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Monthly High Dose Oral Cholecalciferol on Serum 25 Hydroxy Vitamin D Levels in Bariatric Surgery Subjects
DOC.criteria: morbidly obese meeting criteria for gastric bypass over age 18 taking medications that affect vitamin D status, elevated serum hydroxy vit D or calcium
